item.description: Group PhD Students Alina Chadwick (joined Fall 2024) Joe Saber (joined Fall 2023) Rebecca Salganik (joined Spring 2025, joint with Jian Kang) Undergraduate Students Christopher Bruinsma (UR, class of 2023) Quan Luu (UR, class of 2023) Yoo (Daniel) Choi (UR, class of 2024) Chengkai (Kai) Kang (UR, class of 2024) Junfei Liu (UR, class of 2024) Matthew Iceland (UR, class of 2025) Kiet Nguyen (UR, class of 2025) Minh Nguyen (UR, class of 2025) Euan Seow (UR, class of 2026) Milos Bisenic (UR, class of 2026) Miles Frank (UR, class of 2026) Yicheng (Nicho) Wang (UR, class of 2026) Taggart Vales (UR, class of 2026)

Publications Conference and Journal Papers Dutch Books and Money Pumps: Rectifying Vulnerabilities in LLMs Through Rationality. (a) Alina Chadwick, Anson Kahng, and Jens Kipper. HAR 2026. [pdf] When to Stop Getting Tested: The Theory of Diagnostic Tests. (a) Anson Kahng and Joseph Saber. AAMAS 2025 (extended abstract) [pdf] FPBA: Flexible Percentile-Based Allocation for Multiple-Bits-Per-Cell RRAM. (a) Junfei Liu and Anson Kahng. ASP-DAC 2025. [pdf] Sampling Winners in Ranked Choice Voting.

Teaching Spring 2024: CSC 289/489. Algorithmic Game Theory. Fall 2023: DSCC/CSC/TCS 462. Computational Introduction to Statistics. Spring 2023: CSC 289/489. Algorithmic Game Theory. Fall 2022: DSCC/CSC/TCS 462. Computational Introduction to Statistics.
